Text.Page:
The Scions of Lok seized the Cardovek Remnants east of here. Our researchers dare not approachâ€”they're scholars, not soldiers.

Go on the offensive and kill the {@LinkCreature:7#11#Bloodguards}. The primacy of our mission must be assured!
The task is complete? Excellent. Our researchers can begin. Time is short and we're not about to lose to those wretched cultists!
